source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.
source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening

items.title: Vastu Foundation Course 1 (MAHAVASTU Consultant- NEHA PARIK)

visible_instructors.title: Neha Parik
visible_instructors.name: Neha
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of Science Behind Vastu & MAHAVASTU Expert

items.headline: This foundation course enables beginners to understand fundamentals of Vastu Shastra & exploring career in VASTU
objectives_summary: This foundation course enables beginners to understand fundamentals of Vastu Shastra, exploring career in MAHAVASTU, becoming helpful for family and friends to suggest authentic VASTU solutions.

Helps you learn MAHAVASTU methodology for step-by-step diagnosis of any problem and then applying MAHAVASTU techniques for balancing. You will be taught application of popular MAHAVASTU remedies as well as using household objects as remedies for achieving desired results.
Learn about the importance of color and elements around us

items.title: Drip Irrigation Design and Installation for Beginners
items.headline: How to Design,Install and Maintain your Drip Irrigation System
objectives_summary: At the completion of this course students will have a better understanding of drip irrigation systems and how they work
You'll learn the basics of designing your home drip irrigation system
You will learn the importance of filtration in any drip system

items.title: Beekeeping 101: An Intro to Beekeeping Class

visible_instructors.title: Margaret Smith
visible_instructors.name: Margaret
visible_instructors.job_title: Bringing old fashion traditions to modern living

items.headline: How to start your own backyard beehive.
objectives_summary: Choose a beehive
Choose appropriate beekeeping gear
Learn How to set up a beehive correctly

items.title: Grow Like a Superpro - Become an Indoor Gardening Superstar
items.headline: ​Take the guesswork out of indoor gardening with the brand new complete, seed to harvest, video tutorial series
objectives_summary: Take the guesswork out of growing with the brand new complete, seed to harvest, video tutorial series. This new series hosted by none other than “Growing with Rory” will impart you with the skills necessary to achieve record breaking yields and the highest quality results.

items.title: How to Buy a House for First Time Home Buyers in 2021
items.headline: 10 Proven and Simple Steps to Buying Your Dream Home From Start to Finish Without Hiring an Agent in Under Three Months
objectives_summary: Learn the preliminary steps to buying a home
Learn how to find the right agent and lender
Learn the process of getting loanpre-approval

items.title: Gardening Know How: DIY Garden Design
items.headline: Create your own custom garden design, using the same techniques as the pros!
objectives_summary: Learn when it's better to DIY, and when you should hire a professional
Learn how to create your own customized garden or landscape design
Understand how to clearly communicate your design goals to a professional landscape designer or architect

items.title: Bio-Organic Farming & Gardening: GROW Your Own FOOD
items.headline: IT'S ALL HERE! Soil, Plan/Prep, Compost, Seeds, Plant, Pests, Harvest-  GROW Your OWN BioDynamic Organics
objectives_summary: How To Farm- Thorough Simpl, Step-by-Step Organic Farming, utilizing ancient tried-and-true Farming Methods and Rhythms from Cosmos
Examples from Ladakh, Thailand, Nepal, Saipan Island, South Korea, all of which can apply to Your Operation.
To Grow your Own Food in the most reliable, practical Earth-loving ways possible.

items.title: Learn How to Create Cushions & Grow a Sewing Business

visible_instructors.title: Linda Turner
visible_instructors.name: Linda
visible_instructors.job_title: Interior Designer specialising in soft furnishings

items.headline: Become and expert cushion maker.
objectives_summary: Learn how to make a scatter cushion from scratch
Understand how to add piping to a cushion cover
Confidently attach a zip to a cushion

items.title: Build a PVC Drip Irrigation System for your Garden
items.headline: Learn all you will need to know to improve your vegetable gardening by adding a PVC Drip system to water your plants
objectives_summary: Learn why you should choose a PVC system over the other systems out there.
Design a PVC drip system for your garden.
Create a main line water distribution system that will make it easy to get water to each of your garden beds

items.title: Judie's Story: An Intimate Decluttering & Organizing Journey
items.headline: Watch 2 professional organizers in action guiding Judie through her personal decluttering and organizing journey.
objectives_summary: Watch a real story as it happened. Understand challenges and the method followed. Get inspired and empowered to take action.  Being able to declutter and organize your own home.
There are no exercises.

items.title: Raising Chickens in your Backyard: a sustainable food source

visible_instructors.title: Criss Ittermann
visible_instructors.name: Criss
visible_instructors.job_title: Owner, Coach & Adventurer - The Eclectic Tech

items.headline: Practicing permaculture & homesteading for urbanites: farming chicks, building a chicken coop, collecting hen's eggs.
objectives_summary: You will learn general information on ease of care, and creating your chicken lifestyle.
You will be able to decide how many chickens you need for your family's needs, and whether or not to have a rooster.
You will understand the life cycles of chickens, their habits, normal behaviors, and have your expectations set for raising chickens.

items.title: Beginner's Guide to Garden Design
items.headline: Garden Design and Landscaping
objectives_summary: You will have an understanding of garden design graphics and how to apply them to a garden design plan
It will develop your knowledge of the principles of garden design and how to apply them to a garden plan

items.headline: basic troubleshooting
objectives_summary: apply their new knowledge to help friends and family members and even make some extra money doing some basic troubleshooting

items.title: Woodworking: Fundamentals of Cabinet Making

visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska
visible_instructors.name: George
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America

items.headline: This extensive cabinet making course will help improve many aspects of your woodworking skills and add value to any home
objectives_summary: This woodworking course provides every detail you need to build quality cabinets in your shop.
Designing cabinets and choosing the best material for your project.
How to perfectly dimension a face frame and face frame joinery techniques.

items.title: Growing Fruit Trees with Ease

visible_instructors.title: Susan Poizner
visible_instructors.name: Susan
visible_instructors.job_title: Director, Orchard People Fruit Tree Care Education

items.headline: An organic gardener's guide to keeping your fruit trees healthy and productive
objectives_summary: In this course, Urban Orchardist Susan Poizner will teach you the nine steps to growing organic fruit trees successfully.
You will learn the importance of choosing the right "easier-to-grow" tree.
You will learn how to care for your trees when they are young and how to feed your trees annually.

items.title: Queen Bee Breeding for Backyard Beekeeping

visible_instructors.title: Janet Luke
visible_instructors.name: Janet
visible_instructors.job_title: Urban Sustainable Living Expert and Author

items.headline: Learn how to successfully raise your own queen using a graftless method suitable for all hive designs.
objectives_summary: Recognize the difference between eggs and larva in a cell
be able to state the best time of the year to start queen breeding
state what needs to be present to successfully reed queen in your apairy
